item.title: Jeffries: House Intel chair’s removal was an ‘unjustified ouster’
Live updates: Senate holds confirmation hearings for Treasury, EPA, other Trump Cabinet posts
item.description: The Senate is holding more confirmation hearings for President-elect Donald Trump’s Cabinet picks ahead of his return to office on Monday.
